channel.title: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3
channel.description:
Hey there i made this badges for my forum, i would like some feedback on colours/design etc...
(I know its childish that i add a watermark over it...)
Anyways feedback!
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/ih3x2s.png[/img]

item.source: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3

item.title: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:14, topic:477371”]Web design as in and around the frontend of websites, not graphical design. Backend is the programming side of everything, frontend is the presentation and styling side using the likes of CSS, not graphics design. Just because they both finish in design doesn’t make them intertwine.[/quote]Agreed. You can use any sort of graphic on a website and call it “website design”.

Read full topic
item.source: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3

item.title: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Web design as in and around the frontend of websites, not graphical design. Backend is the programming side of everything, frontend is the presentation and styling side using the likes of CSS, not graphics design. Just because they both finish in design doesn’t make them intertwine.

Read full topic
item.source: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3

item.title: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Did you wrote some type of package modification for this where you can apply it to SMF? Otherwise it's just graphics.

Dont forget it is not only Web Development, but also Web Design.
If i made badges for my bowling club or other crap, it would of need to go to graphics, but this is website reletated.

Read full topic
item.source: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3

item.title: Showoff My forum Badges i made, feedback please <3
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:11, topic:477371”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=595564.msg4194243#msg4194243 date=1357265150]
Fuck all to do with website design or development. Should be graphics design board. Good effort on them though.
[/quote]

No, Just no…

These buttons are modifications of a Forum theme wich is Website Designing.
And thanks ;)[/quote]
Did you wrote some type of package modification for this where you can apply it to SMF? Otherwise it’s just graphics.

Read full topic
